name: happen
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: happen
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: (of a situation or an event) to have existence or come into existence

example.eg: No one knows exactly what happened but several people have been hurt.
example.egtrans: 没人确切了解发生了什么事，只知道有数人受伤。

example.eg: Anything could happen in the next half hour.
example.egtrans: 接下来的半小时内什么事都可能会发生。

example.eg: A funny thing happened in the office today.
example.egtrans: 今天，办公室里发生了一件有趣的事。

example.eg: I don't want to think about what might have happened if he'd been driving any faster.
example.egtrans: 我不愿意去想假如他再开快些会怎么样。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: If something happens to someone or something, it has an effect on him, her, or it.
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 发生在（某人）身上；作用于…

example.eg: I don't know what I'd do if anything happened to him (= if he was hurt, became ill, or died).
example.egtrans: 我不知道一旦他出了事我该怎么办。

example.eg: What happened to your jacket? There's a big rip in the sleeve.
example.egtrans: 你的夹克怎么了？袖子上撕了一条大口子。

example.eg: What's happened to my pen? (= Where is it?) I put it down there a few moments ago.
example.egtrans: 我的钢笔哪儿去了？我刚刚把它放在那儿。

dsense.name: happen
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to do or be by chance

example.eg: They happened to look (= looked by chance) in the right place almost immediately.
example.egtrans: 他们碰巧几乎一下就找对了地方。

example.eg: Fortunately it happened (that) there was no one in the house at the time of the explosion.
example.egtrans: 幸运的是，爆炸发生时，屋子里没有人。

example.eg: It just so happens that I have her phone number right here.
example.egtrans: 非常凑巧，我正好有她的电话号码。

example.eg: She happens to like cleaning (= she likes cleaning, although that is surprising).
example.egtrans: 她恰恰就喜欢打扫卫生。

example.eg: I happen to think he's right (= I do think so, although you do not).
As it happened (= although it was not planned), I had a few minutes to spare.

name: happen
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.
